references.paper_title: Imagen Video: High Definition Video Generation with Diffusion Models
references.reason: This paper introduces a foundational text-to-video diffusion model that the current work builds upon for long video generation.

references.paper_title: FIFO-Diffusion: Generating Infinite Videos from Text without Training
references.reason: This paper proposes the first-in-first-out (FIFO) diffusion method, a direct precursor to the Ouroboros-Diffusion method described in the current work.

references.paper_title: FreeNoise: Tuning-Free Longer Video Diffusion via Noise Rescheduling
references.reason: This paper presents a tuning-free long video generation method that is compared against the proposed method in the current work.

references.paper_title: VideoCrafter1: Open Diffusion Models for High-Quality Video Generation
references.reason: This paper provides the base text-to-video diffusion model used in the current work.

references.paper_title: VBench: Comprehensive Benchmark Suite for Video Generative Models
references.reason: This paper introduces the benchmark dataset used to evaluate the performance of different long video generation methods, including the proposed method in the current work.
